sense.gloss: to squeeze (fruit to extract juice), to press, to extract, to milk, to express milk
to rack (one's brains), to strain (one's voice)
to chew out, to reprimand severely, to rake over the coals, to give a sound scolding, to tell someone off, to scold, to rebuke
to narrow down (one's focus), to whittle down
to gather up (curtain, etc.), to tighten (drawstring)
to hold down, to constrict, to immobilize

sdata.j: ああ、↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓はそんなふうに↑搾↑↓|しぼ↓る|のですか。
sdata.e: Oh, is that the way you milk a cow?

sdata.j: ↑上手↑↓じょうず↓な↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓はひとつの↑鍵↑↓かぎ↓となる↑証拠↑↓しょうこ↓に↑的↑↓まと↓を↑絞↑↓|しぼ↓る|。
sdata.e: A good lawyer will always zero in on a key piece of evidence.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は５ポンド↑絞↑↓|しぼ↓る|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がある。
sdata.e: I need to lose five pounds.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓↑世紀↑↓せいき↓も、↑読↑↓よ↓み↑書↑↓か↓きに↑焦点↑↓しょうてん↓を↑絞↑↓|しぼ↓る|↑語学↑↓ごがく↓↑教育↑↓きょういく↓である。
sdata.e: For centuries, foreign language teaching focused on reading and writing.
